Chicks

"Do you want to watch Charlie's Angels tonight?" Doug asks. "I've never seen it, but I think it's an action story without a plot."

"Hmmm," I say, "sounds like something I'm writing, only mine doesn't have action, either."

But the dialog is fantastic.

Commenting is not available in this weblog entry.

I still think I could have written Good Will Hunting, or at least the half of the screenplay that started with F. Where's the challenge?
